headline.main: GERMAN ADVANCE MENACES ROSTOV; Donets Basin Flanked in Push on South Coast, Berlin Says -- Action Called 'Pursuit' GERMAN ADVANCE MENACES ROSTOV

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Oct. 7 -- German troops, carrying out a part of Reichsfuehrer Hitler's new operations to crush the Red Army before Winter, have occupied Mariupol on the Sea of Azov and are less than 110 miles from Rostov on the Don, an authorized German spokesman declared tonight.
